short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change a text to uppercase and lowercase quickly and easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Includes a converter in the right-click menu**

The extension is very easy to use: 
- Copy a text and paste it into the extension box. 
- Press the button according to how you want it (Uppercase, Lowercase, Capitalize, Capitalize All, Add hyphen, No spaces and No line break). 
- The extension will automatically select the result for you to copy. 
- Done, paste it wherever you want.
